explains: adj. 英勇的，勇敢的；华丽的；雄伟的

sentences.en: The gallant soldiers lost their lives so that peace might reign again.
sentences.cn: 英勇的士兵为了恢复和平而牺牲了他们的生命。

sentences.en: I had been promoted for what was called gallant and meritorious service.
sentences.cn: 我因立下了所谓的英勇卓越功勋而获得了提拔。

sentences.en: They were all on their beds, and gallant Michael let go first.
sentences.cn: 他们都在床上，勇敢的迈克尔第一个起飞。
